DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate effect add protein+leucine caffeine 1.2 g/kg/h CHO rate post-exercise muscle glycogen re-synthesis healthy , recreational athlete . The investigator hypothesize intervention ( addition caffeine protein+leucine ) lead high glycogen re-synthesis compare ingestion CHO , co-ingestion protein leucine result high muscle glycogen synthesis rate .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Glycogen Synthesis When Caffeine Protein Co-Ingested With Carbohydrates
DOC.criteria: male cyclist healthy BMI < 25 female use medication non cycle BMI > 25
